#labels Anagram,Example
Map/Reduce program to find out all the anagrams in the given data corpus

== Introduction ==

Anagram example:
*Mapper Class* : [http://code.google.com/p/hadoop-map-reduce-examples/source/browse/trunk/hadoop-examples/src/com/hadoop/examples/anagrams/AnagramMapper.java Mapper Class]
*Reducer Class* : [http://code.google.com/p/hadoop-map-reduce-examples/source/browse/trunk/hadoop-examples/src/com/hadoop/examples/anagrams/AnagramReducer.java Reducer Class]

== Data Set ==
The Data Set download for this example is available at 
http://www.gutenberg.org/dirs/etext02/mword10.zip

== Instructions ==
Extract the zip file mword10.zip and review the contents and for the first run copy the SINGLE.TXT to the HDFS.
